title: Magnifier, 3rd Hand Helping Tool, 5X Magnifying Glass Soldering Station,Magnifying Glass Stand with Auxiliary Clamp and Alligator Clips
features: HELPING HAND FOR PRECISION CRAFT: The must have soldering, modeling, hobby, art and crafts and electronics tool to assist you when two hands are simply not enough! These 3rd Hand Magnifier help hold on your work, so your jewelry, crafting, soldering, modeling or other precision job gets the professional result you need and deserve. From painting a figurine to soldering a circuit board you need this help.

SUITABLE FOR MULTIPURPOSE: The perfect assistant to soldering projects such as working with circuit boards, wiring, jewelry and arts and crafts. Perfect workstation for soldering, building models, electronics repair, DIY projects, hobby and crafts.
ADJUSTABLE: 2 fully adjustable helping hands with clamp and alligator clips, iron holder, and tray. All points are rotatable and can be fixed to desired position or angle.
STABLE BASE WITH SOLDERING FACILITIES: The base of the tool is made of cast iron and it is in horseshoe shape. Soldering stand keeps your soldering iron safe and easy to reach during projects.

MAGNFICATION: A large magnifying glass with 5X magnification will allow you to see exactly what you are looking for. A 62mm diameter lens makes sure everything stays in frame for the duration of the task for easy close-up inspection with minimal distortion and can be rotated a total 360-degrees to sit exactly where you need it.
description: Features: With a 5X magnifier and 2 clamps. The base of the tool is made of cast iron and it is in horseshoe shape. All points are rotatable and can be fixed to desired position or angle. This tool is ideal for soldering and working with small parts and pieces. It is practical in jewelry soldering work and electronic assembly.  Specification: Condition: 100% Brand New Item Type: Jewelry Accessory Material: Steel Color: As Shown in the Picture Lens Diameter: Approx. 62mm / 2.44inch Weight: Approx. 324g  Package list: 1 * Magnifier  Note: Magnifier can be removed and tool can be used alone.
